meanings.sent1: The sturdy bedframe held up the soft mattress.
meanings.sent2: She painted the bedframe to match the bedroom decor.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat used the bedframe as a scratching post.
meanings.sent4: His determination was the bedframe of his success.
meanings.sent5: The bedframe creaked under the weight of the jumping children.

meanings.sent1: The metal bedframe was simple yet elegant.
meanings.sent2: The antique bedframe was passed down through generations.
meanings.sent3: The bedframe seemed to whisper bedtime stories to the sleepy child.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were woven into the intricate design of the bedframe.
meanings.sent5: The bedframe stood strong through many restless nights.
